import { Select, TextField, Button, Box, Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { db } from "../../config/Firebase"; const formAlignStyle = { backgroundColor: "#010202", height: "100vh", paddingTop: "40px", display: "flex", flexDirection: "row", alignItems: "center", position: "relative", }; const PlayerForm = () => { const [AddPlayer, setAddPlayer] = useState(null); const handleChange = (e) => { setAddPlayer({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (AddPlayer !== null) { addPlayer(AddPlayer); } }; const addPlayer = (player) => { db.collection("players").doc(player.name).set({ name: player.name, age: player.age, baseprice: player.baseprice, Batavg: player.Batavg, Image: player.Image, Runs: player.Runs, strikerate: player.strikerate, Bowlavg: player.Bowlavg, wickets: player.wickets, economy: player.economy, category: player.category, display: player.display, status: player.status, maxbid: player.maxbid, maxbidBy: player.maxbidBy, team: player.team, class: player.class, }); }; return (
{/* password */} {/* First Name */}

{authError}

: null} */}
); }; export default PlayerForm;
